com.vector.cfg.automation.api.project

Interface IOpenProjectApi


  • @PublishedApi(value=ADDITIONS_ALLOWED)
 @PublishedApiDomain(value=AUTOMATION_IF)
public interface IOpenProjectApi
    IOpenProjectApi provides means for parameterizing the process of opening a project.
    IOpenProjectApi provides means for parameterizing the process of opening a project.

    (c) Copyright Vctr Informatik GmbH. All Rights Reserved.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dpaFile(java.lang.Object dpaFile)
      Alias for setDpaFile(Object).
      void enableValidation(boolean validation)
      Alias for setEnableValidation(boolean).
      void loadGenerators(boolean generators)
      Alias for setLoadGenerators(boolean).
      void setDpaFile(java.lang.Object dpaFile)
      Using setDpaFile(Object) the .dpa file of the project to be opened can be specified.
      void setEnableValidation(boolean validation)
      Using setEnableValidation(boolean) is can be specified whether or not to activate validation for the opened project.
      void setLoadGenerators(boolean generators)
      Using setLoadGenerators(boolean) is can be specified whether or not to activate generators (including their validations) for the opened project.

      • setDpaFile

        @PublishedMethod
void setDpaFile(java.lang.Object dpaFile)
        Using setDpaFile(Object) the .dpa file of the project to be opened can be specified.
        DPA File
        Using setDpaFile(Object) the .dpa file of the project to be opened can be specified. The value given here is converted to Path using Converters.TO_SCRIPT_PATH .
        Parameters:
        dpaFile - the .dpa file of the project to be opened

      • setEnableValidation

        @PublishedMethod
void setEnableValidation(boolean validation)
        Using setEnableValidation(boolean) is can be specified whether or not to activate validation for the opened project.
        Validation
        Using setEnableValidation(boolean) is can be specified whether or not to activate validation for the opened project.
        Parameters:
        validation -

      • setLoadGenerators

        @PublishedMethod
void setLoadGenerators(boolean generators)
        Using setLoadGenerators(boolean) is can be specified whether or not to activate generators (including their validations) for the opened project.
        Generators
        Using setLoadGenerators(boolean) is can be specified whether or not to activate generators (including their validations) for the opened project.
        Parameters:
        generators - whether or not to activate generators (including their validations) for the project
